direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods are fundamental to object comparison and hash code generation, sharing similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods involve boolean logic and are used to determine order or equality, though they serve different purposes.
The hashCode method depends on the trueFirst field, which is also accessed by the sortsTrueFirst method.
The hashCode method indirectly depends on the trueFirst field, which is set by the booleanComparator method.
The hashCode method indirectly depends on the trueFirst field, which is set by the getFalseFirstComparator method.
The hashCode method indirectly depends on the trueFirst field, which is set by the getTrueFirstComparator method.
